quiz_item.error_analysis: 学生易将“to broaden”与形近词“bolden”（使大胆）、“brighten”（使变亮）混淆，或误将词根“broad”（宽）与“board”（板）联系导致理解偏差。
quiz_item.sentence: To **broaden** the road, the city government decided to remove the old trees along the sides.

option.definition: 使板变硬（To make a board harder.）
扩大；拓宽（To make something wider or larger.）
